description: The Regional Energy Deployment System (ReEDS™) is a free, open-access tool that empowers users to explore least-cost pathways for large-scale power sector transformation. NREL’s flagship energy capacity planning model for the North American electricity system allows users to examine the interactions between policy, technology, economics, and the environment when integrating renewables onto the grid from now through 2050.
name: ReEDS™ (Regional Energy Deployment System) [SWR-20-36 and SWR-09-14]
